commit.message:
PR middle-end/PR30700

	PR middle-end/PR30700
	* dwarf2out.c (reference_to_unused): Ask cgraph for functions 
	availablility; add more sanity checking; ask varpool only about
	VAR_DECL.

From-SVN: r123358

files.patch:
